org.neuroph.nnet.learning

Class AntiHebbianLearning

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.neuroph.core.learning.LearningRule
      • org.neuroph.core.learning.IterativeLearning
        • org.neuroph.core.learning.UnsupervisedLearning
          • org.neuroph.nnet.learning.UnsupervisedHebbianLearning
            • org.neuroph.nnet.learning.AntiHebbianLearning
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class AntiHebbianLearning
extends UnsupervisedHebbianLearning
    A variant of Hebbian learning called Anti-Hebbian learning. The only difference is that it subbstracts weight change (Hebbian learning adds)
    Author:
    Zoran Sevarac
    See Also:
